content.rendered:
The European Summer School on Quantum AI aims to be a stimulating space for young researchers and Ph.D. students. They will be given the opportunity to present the results of their research related to Quantum Machine Learning or other AI/ML topics, interacting with their scientific peers in a constructive environment, building bridges between Quantum and Classical Machine Learning.

All accepted partecipants may submit a poster to present their research activity!

The poster should be submitted before 25 August 2022, 23:59, GMT +1:00, Italy Time.

We will reserve a suitable space for students to show their posters at the summer school’s location (CISM), and a digital version will be made available on the EQAI website.

Poster Guidelines

Poster Submission

The poster should be written in English and sent to info@cism.it and info.eqai@gmail.com by 25 August 2022, 23:59, GMT +1:00 in a printable A1 format (.pdf or .jpg 300dpi), preferably horizontal.

Specifications:

> Title: all capitals, unicode character set
> Author List: in the format “Surname1 N1., Surname2 N2, …”
> Abstract: each poster should contain an abstract, max 500 characters
> Size: 594 mm tall x 841 mm wide (A1 format)

Physical poster

You will need to print the poster and bring it with you on the day of the poster session.

Alternatively, CISM can arrange the poster printing here in Udine if the poster will be sent to info@cism.it by 25 August 2022. Please note that all posters sent after the deadline cannot be taken into consideration.

The printing price here in Udine is of 12 Euro: payment can be made at CISM via VISA or MC Credit card or ATM card (NO CASH).
